Text:
It don't works with all games...
Only few NTSC-J or NTSC-U games are working on a pal Wii (reverse too).

And WiiBrickBlocker just remove updates from the game, a NTSC update can brick a pal Wii (and reverse too).

go there for more informations :
http://wiki.gbatemp.net/index.php?title=Wii_Region_Patcher_Compatibility_List
You need a modded or chipped wii for this, right?
